attributes.action: Null and Void the results of the deeply flawed 2016 EU Referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
1. Many UK citizens and residents who'll be affected by the UK leaving the EU weren't able to vote.

attributes.background:
The EU referendum in 2016 was deeply flawed. The results should be null and voided. The UK should remain in the EU as all the evidence suggests leaving will lead to an economic catastrophe, a devalued pound, job losses, and a loss of UK influence on the world stage.

The flaws in the referendum:-
